high_descs: move to the dresser at the foot of the bed
pick up a cup from the dresser
move to the left of the dresser
anns.task_desc: Inspect a mug with a lamp.

high_descs: Go right and then right again to face the white dresser to the left of the bed.
Pick the white mug up from the white dresser.
Move to the left and face the lamp on the white dresser.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a mug and turn a lamp on.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the tall white dresser across the room
Pick up the white coffee mug that is sitting on top of the dresser
Take a step to the left and continue to stand facing the dresser
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the dresser
anns.task_desc: Look at a coffee mug under a lamp
